actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to authorize construction of a project for flood control and other purposes in the Bassett Creek Watershed, Hennepin County, Minn.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Army, acting through the Chief of Engineers, to construct a flood control project in the Bassett Creek Watershed in Minnesota, at an estimated Federal cost of $7,231,000.

titles.title: A bill to authorize construction of a project for flood control and other purposes in the Bassett Creek Watershed, Hennepin County, Minn.
